title: I'm A Heavy Drinker And All I Want Right Now Is To Pretend I’M Drunk And Be Held
alternative_title: 酒豪女子、今だけは酔ったふりして抱かれたい ; Shugou Joshi, Imadake wa Yotta Furi Shite Dakaretai
status: 酒豪女子、今だけは酔ったふりして抱かれたい ; Shugou Joshi, Imadake wa Yotta Furi Shite Dakaretai
description:
Description :
        "Can I do more than just kiss you?" Pushing up your hips like you're nasty and blending in like you're perfectly sucking it... It's the first time I've ever had such pleasant sex! Suzu Yagami works in an office and enjoys alcohol more than three meals a day. A miraculous reunion with handsome Naoe-kun, who met his eyes at the bar where he was entertained! We hit it off and toasted with beer and edamame at an izakaya. We share the same taste for alcohol, and it's really fun to talk to her. If you hug me and say, "I don't want to go home like this," this is destiny! ―― However, he has a "certain circumstance"... This love has to end...
